title: [BUG] Not linking correctly
body: **Description** After a full rebuild the app works, only subsequent builds with **Code** N/A , happens regardless **Expected Behavior** No crash **Actual Behavior** Crash - see attached screenshot **Basic Information** - Version with issue: 1.68.3 , VS Mac 8.6 Build 4520 - Last known good version: This version until latest VS update - IDE: 8.6 4520 - Mac - Platform Target Frameworks: Xamarin forms 4.6.0.800 - iOS: 12 - Target Devices: iPhone SE 2020 Simulator **Screenshots** **Reproduction Link**
